word: The Lord is looking upon us in mercy and love today. Who will follow out the will of the Lord? Who will study to overcome the hasty temper, remembering that the words they speak are spoken in the hearing of heavenly angels? These heavenly agencies are continually ministering to us.--Manuscript 73, Aug. 27, 1909, "Lessons From the First Chapter of Daniel," sermon preached at Council Grove camp meeting.
